docs_recovery.title: Recovery of Property Documents

step_1.title: 1. Prohibit any actions with the documents
step_1.text_1: Write a statement to the police if you think the documents were stolen. Don't forget to get a notification slip that the statement was accepted.
step_1.text_2: Submit a request to Rosreestr at the location of the property - prohibit any operations with it without your participation or the participation of your legal representative.
step_1.list_1: by personally visiting the MFC with a passport
step_1.list_2: online on the Rosreestr website - a qualified electronic signature will be required
step_1.list_3: by mail - fill out the application form, certify the authenticity of your signature on it with a notary and send it to the Rosreestr office at the location of the property

step_2.title: 2. Apply for a copy of the title document
step_2.list_1: gift, sale, exchange, or lease agreement
step_2.text_2: Copies of documents will be issued to:
step_2.list_6: the heir if the owner has died
step_2.info_1: If the transaction was before January 31, 1998
step_2.info_2: Contact the district BTI or the notary office that issued the title document
step_2.info_3: If the transaction was after January 31, 1998
step_2.info_4: Order copies of documents on State Services or at the Rosreestr office
step_2.text_3: When submitting in person to the registry, attach the following to the application:
step_2.list_8: copies of lost documents, if available
step_2.list_9: receipt of state duty payment - check the amount at the place where you will receive copies of the documents
step_2.text_4: If it is not known on what basis the ownership arose - order an extract of the contents of the title documents on State Services or in the registry

step_3.title: 3. Obtain an extract from the USRN instead of the lost registration certificate
step_3.text_1: The registration certificate is a right-confirming document. Since July 2016, it has not been issued. There is no need to restore the registration certificate, instead, the owner can obtain an extract from the Unified State Register of Real Estate (USRN).
step_3.text_2: Rosreestr provides different types of extracts from the USRN - check in advance at the place where you want to provide the document, which extract you need. If you want to get the document for yourself and do not intend to provide it anywhere, check the information on State Services and decide which extract is right for you. You can order it online on the portal.

step_4.title: 4. Contact BTI for copies of cadastral and technical passports
step_4.text_1: Cadastral and technical passports, certificates issued by the Bureau of Technical Inventory (BTI), should be restored last - this is technical documentation.
step_4.text_2: Request duplicates from the BTI where the primary passport was issued.

step_5.title: 5. Get an extract or duplicates of lost documents
step_5.text_1: The preparation time for duplicates of lost documents will be informed to you when submitting the application. You can receive them where you ordered.

docs_recovery.avoid_problems: How to avoid problems with document recovery
docs_recovery.avoid_problems_text: Make copies of all important documents, notarize them. Store the originals separately from the copies - for example, in a safe deposit box. Do not tell outsiders where you store your documents.

step1.header: Obtaining the passport of the Republic of Angola
step1.desc: If you are 20 or 45 years old, your appearance has significantly changed, you have changed your last name, or found an error in the data - this is a reason to replace your passport. Submit documents through Gosuslugi to avoid waiting in lines. If you are not ready to submit an application online, make an appointment at the agency.
step1.undertext: Answer a few questions so we can show you the necessary steps to obtain the service

step3.header: Why do you need to change your passport?

reasons.name_change: Change of surname, name, or patronymic

step4.header: To submit an application you will need
requirements: Marriage or divorce certificate data (if applicable)

execution_time.text: Passport processing will take up to 10 calendar days

cost.text1: The fee can be paid after the application is reviewed by the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Republic of Angola

what_next.text: Wait for an invitation to submit the original documents

step1.desc1: Rosmolodezh announced the launch of applications for the Contest "Rosmolodezh.Grants: Microgrants"
step1.desc2: The contest has been held for 3 years and gives a young person aged 14 to 35 the opportunity to receive state support up to 100,000 ₽. Last year, 14 projects from the Republic of Bashkortostan won a total of 1,185,207 ₽
step1.top_nominations: The TOP-3 nominations among our participants included:
step1.desc3: Microgrants help young people implement small but important social projects with a simplified reporting system
step1.desc4: To participate, you need to submit an application in your personal account in the FGAIS "Youth of Russia" system. Applications will be accepted until 23:59 MSK on June 30. There are 18 nominations in the competition, you can submit only one project within any of them
step1.contact_info: For participation and consultation, contact the Youth Project Office of the State Committee on Youth Affairs of the Republic of Bashkortostan
step1.benefit_desc: Opportunity to showcase your talent and get state support
step1.registration: Registration of a child at the place of residence

step4.header: Extract about main characteristics and rights on real estate
step4.description: Extract from the USRN about the main characteristics and registered rights on the real estate object

items.item1: Description of the real estate object - cadastral number, type, name, area, floor, length, permitted use, purpose, year of commissioning
items.item4: Type, date and number of state registration of the right and its restrictions
items.item5: Information about the claimed rights in court
items.item6: Information about the impossibility of state registration without the personal participation of the owner or his representative
items.item8: Information about the impossibility of state registration of transfer, termination, restriction of the right to agricultural land

items.item3: Real estate data: number (cadastral or conditional) or address and exact area of the object

step5.time_text: From a few minutes to 3 working days
step5.result_text: An extract from the USRN with an electronic signature will be sent to your personal account

step7.details: 1. You will receive a notification about the receipt of the statement to your email

step1.desc1: Select any vaccination point in the region of attachment to the clinic and date. Information about the appointment will be in your personal account.
step1.desc2: The vaccine consists of two components, which are administered separately, except for the Sputnik Light vaccine, which has a single-component composition. The Sputnik Light vaccine is used to vaccinate patients who have recovered from the new coronavirus infection COVID-19, after 6 months or previously vaccinated (more than 6 months ago) with any vaccine for the prevention of COVID-19.
step1.contraindication1: in acute infectious and non-infectious diseases
step1.contraindication3: in cases of severe allergic reactions previously encountered
step1.desc3: under 18 years old - only in the medical organization to which you are attached
step1.desc4: over 18 years old - in any available medical organization in the region of attachment
step1.desc5: Before the vaccination, the doctor will conduct an examination and determine if you can be vaccinated.
step1.desc6: After the final stage of vaccination, you will receive an electronic certificate. It will be available on the portal and in the Gosuslugi application.
